sentence.Network_en: This is Yang Zhiyuan undoubtedly revive ambuscade below countless landmine.
sentence.Network_cn: 这无疑为杨致远的复兴埋伏下无数的地雷.

sentence.Network_en: They prepared an ambuscade for the Romans.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在罗马人周围埋下伏兵.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... ambulatory 走动的 ambuscade 埋伏 ambush 埋伏.
伏字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 伏虎〖 yieldtiger〗 伏击〖 ambuscade;ambush〗 伏流〖 groundstream〗.
十五级词... ... amaranthine a. 不凋的, 不死的, 紫红的 ambuscade n. 埋伏, 伏兵, 埋伏处 amenable adj . 愿服从的， 通情达理的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French embuscade, from Italian imboscata, Spanish emboscada, or Portuguese embuscada, based on a late Latin word meaning to 'place in a wood'; related to bush

means.word_mean: 1. the act of concealing yourself and lying in wait to attack by surprise
